articles.description: Smollett was freed from the Cook County Jail on Wednesday night. He served just six days of his 150-day sentence. As he recuperated on Thursday, social media erupted with memes and jokes.
articles.content: Jussie Smollett's release from jail on Wednesday night has spawned a wave of disbelief, outrage and mockery of the entire case against Empire actor, with many considering it the latest episode in a l… [+18315 chars]
